name: The Abandoned Park
description:
The Abandoned Park is a level of a narrative-driven role-playing game. The player plays as Sierra who has to navigate through the city to try and find her way outside of the city walls. The player can also roam around and find clues as to what is happening around them and why the gates aren't opened.

Controls: WASD and mouse to move. Hold Shift to sprint. F to interact. C to crouch.

This project is by Ammara Khalid in Lab 01.

Link to GDD: Khalid_Ammara_GDD
